name: Dark Star (Sklok)
description:
You are an operator in a mysterious spaceship on a mysterious console.

Try to find how the console work (not so difficult),  find witch planet is emeting a mysterious signal, and look over the planet to locate the signal. 

The emiting planet is choosen randomly on the start of each run, every planet have his own maps. 

The gameplay is based on sound and mouse (you will need a 3 buttons mouse).

Cover typography from  :  Dirk Schaechter // https://www.dafont.com/fr/factor-i.d832?l[]=10&l[]=1

In-game typography from : Roberto Mocci // https://patreon.com/rmocci
